name: Cannon Is Protector
description:
This game took over three years to make and is a highly advanced game. In this game you are in cyber space and get to fly space ships and drive hyper bikes. The three modes are story, multiplayer, and training. 

In story mode you start out as a man named cannon your mission is to protect civilians against the bad guys (no spoilers) In multiplayer you will enter a match between two teams last team standing wins. In training you get to train your skills with every gun map or anything in the game.

Rules: Have fun and get a good KD ratio.
